title: How is it that New Hanover county can keep the tax block on your vehicle tags when you owe taxes on another vehicle? The North Carolina statute reads that they are to release the vehicle hold when the taxes are paid on that vehicle. Not every car you own (or do not own) at the time!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Thanks for using MyReporter.com!  http://www.myreporter.com/?p=10650
